short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop making hackers' life easy, forever.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Password Checker helps you to check your password strength before typing it when you register.
Type it first in the extension, assess its strength and simply copy and paste it.
